column5: Hey Addikts,  I'm getting married this SATURDAY and leaving for the honeymoon @ 4am the next morning (to Punta Cana)... Was looking at a few books to bring/purchase that I could read while relaxing on the beach and on the plane...  Anyway, to sum things up - I checked out AMAZON.CA and found out that Mr. Dave Mercer himself has a book out? Its called "Dave Mercers Facts of Fishing"? Few questions... - Has anyone read this book? - Does anyone have this book? - What are your inputs on the book? (can't seem to find any related information on it on Google)  Here's the  LINK  on the book that I found on AMAZON.  I was also wondering if anyone else could suggest a good fishing related book that I could take along on the trip?  Thanks! A2F
Has the concept of honeymoon been explained to you?
LMAO! Yes.... Yes it has.... And trust me... I've packed PLENTY!  If ya catch my drift...
It says its not going to be released until Sept. 2010
I was looking at Mike Iaconelli's book "Fishing on the Edge"... Has anyone read this? Good/Bad?  .... Anyone got any fishing books they can suggest??
The ups and downs of a new brides pajamas by I C Honey's Moon
Pre-nups are not premature puppies By Larry King
This is my 1st "That is utterly hillarious!  " ROTFLMAO response!  How 'bout "Rusty Bed Springs" by I.P. Nitely

Dude... be sure to drink plenty of Mamajuana! (Dominican Viagra!)  what resort are you staying at? I was in Punta Cana earlier this year.. what a great area..  U doing any fishing? We booked a charter with Mike.. and had a blast! until the GF chummed the boat LOL! inexpensive too!  sent me a PM if you have any questions about PC..  G

I've read that book, not too bad, takes you through the ups and downs of the tourny trail from his viewpoint.  How other experiences in life helped him with fishing and stuff, not a bad read.  I didn't really know much about him, so learning about his breakdancing in the boat was comical
"Holes in the Mattress" by Mr. Completely Jim
I went to GRAN BAHIA PRINCIPE in PUNTA CANA.... SO BEAUTIFUL THERE!! Didn't get to go fishing though...
